name: Hue Cat
description:
A cat that loves bread and calls itself Sushi? That's it!
Collect fish to gain special powers and unlock Sushi friends.
Help the kittens stroll the world for adventure in this platform runner with retro graphics and sounds.
Control 20 paws with only one button! They love to run and all you have to do is jump to avoid enemies and obstacles.

Features:
- Play with the coolest cats in the world
- Beautiful Pixel Art graphics and original soundtrack
- Two game modes: story and endless
- Dodge enemies and avoid obstacles to master all levels
- Collect fish and unlock new cats and upgrades (Magnet and Power Fist) 
- Test your reflexes with simple one-button controls

What are you waiting for? Join the cat family!

Instructions:
 - Use the Mouse to navigate through menus;
 - In game, use Space or Mouse Click to Jump and Esc to pause game.

Credits:
